title: Describe Your Ideal Career
prompt_text: Describe your ideal career or job in the future. Explain what skills and personal qualities make you suitable for it, and why it attracts you.

title: Overcoming a Challenge
prompt_text: Write about a time you faced a difficult challenge. How did you overcome it, and what did you learn about yourself from that experience?

title: Teamwork Experience
prompt_text: Describe an experience where you worked as part of a team. What role did you play, what went well, and what would you do differently next time?

title: Learning from Failure
prompt_text: Tell a story about a time you failed at something important to you. What caused it, and how did the failure help you grow or change?

title: Personal Strengths and Weaknesses
prompt_text: Reflect on your personal strengths and weaknesses. How do they influence your work, studies, or relationships with others?
